moves.name: Headbutt
moves.effect: Has a chance (30%) of making the target flinch.

moves.name: Potion
moves.effect: Restores an ally’s HP by approximately 40% of its maximum HP.

moves.name: X Defense All
moves.effect: Raises the Defense of all allied sync pairs by 2 stat ranks.

moves.name: Hippity Hoppity!
moves.effect: When used by Lopunny, raises the Speed of all allied sync pairs by 2 stat ranks. When used by Lopunny, raises the user’s evasiveness by 2 stat ranks. When used by Mega Lopunny, raises the user’s accuracy by 1 stat rank. When used by Mega Lopunny, raises the user’s evasiveness by 3 stat ranks.

syncMove.name: Heart-Thumping Normal Impact
syncMove.description: Become Mega Lopunny until the end of battle. After this sync move is used for the first time each battle, it becomes Fighting type until the end of battle.

passives.name: Sync Morph
passives.description: Changes the user’s sync move type the first time its sync move is used each battle.

passives.name: Revenge Boost 5
passives.description: Has a chance (60%) of charging the user’s move gauge by one when the user is hit by an attack move.

passives.name: Solo Fanfare 6
passives.description: Raises the user’s Attack by 6 stat ranks the first time its sync move is used each battle.

grid.bonus: Potion:MP Refresh 2- Has a chance (30%) of restoring one MP of the user’s move when that move is successful.
X Defense All:MP Refresh 2- Has a chance (30%) of restoring one MP of the user’s move when that move is successful.
High Jump Kick:Move Gauge Refresh 2- Has a chance (30%) of charging the user’s move gauge by one when a move is successful.
Move Gauge Boost:MP Refresh 2- Has a chance (30%) of restoring one MP of the user’s move when that move is successful.
Headbutt:Move Gauge Refresh 2- Has a chance (30%) of charging the user’s move gauge by one when a move is successful.
Hippity Hoppity!:MP Refresh 2- Has a chance (30%) of restoring one MP of the user’s move when that move is successful.
Endurance- When the user enters battle with full HP, applies the Enduring effect to it.
Lithe- Prevents the user from getting paralyzed.
HP Advantage 3- The larger the user’s percentage of remaining HP, the more it powers up the user’s moves.
Ramming Speed- The more the user’s Speed is raised, the more it powers up the user’s moves.
Impatient 1- Has a chance (20%) of reducing the user’s sync move countdown by one when it is hit by an attack move.
Propeller 1- Has a chance (20%) of reducing the user’s sync move countdown by one when its Pokémon uses a move.
